#==============================================================================
Map ID: 001
Map Name: Intro
Tileset: 004: Poke Center
Width: 20, Height: 15

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Intro
(X,Y): (000,000)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
@>Prepare for Transition
@>Play BGM: 'W-000 Onward to Adventure!', 50, 100
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Execute Transition
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 2, 'introBG1', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 2, @15, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bGreetings. Welcome to the Pokémon League 
 :    : Registration Website. I am Aria, an Automated Assistant
 :    : designed to assist with League registration.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bLet's get started with your registration info.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bPlease answer the following questions to the best of 
 :    : your ability.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bFirst off, please fill out your name in the relevant 
 :    : fields. Do note, this cannot be changed later.
@>Label: Enter Name
@>Script: pbTrainerName
@>Text: \w[signskin]\b\PN.\wt[20] Is this the correct name? Remember, this cannot 
 :    : be changed later.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \w[signskin]\bPlease fill out your name.
 @>Jump to Label: Enter Name
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introCharSel', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 1, @20, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Comment: Transtion to avatar select screen
@>Script: pbChangePlayer(0)
@>Text: \w[signskin]\b\PN, please upload a photo to go along with your 
 :    : trainer card application.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bThis will allow the Regional Professor to identify you 
 :    : when you come to claim your trainer card.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bFuture changes can be made to the picture on your 
 :    : trainer card at any Pokémon Center.
@>Label: Who are you?
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bWhich image are you uploading?
 :    : \ch[1,0,IMG_5281,IMG_5347]
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0
 @>Control Variables: [0110: Player Avatar] = 0
 @>Control Switches: [0111: Male Avatar Selected] = ON
 @>Script: $player.outfit=0
 @>Script: pbSet(102,"MORGAN")
 @>Script: pbSet(103,"Morgan")
 @>Show Picture: 2, 'introCharSel1', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
 @>
: Branch End
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
 @>Control Variables: [0110: Player Avatar] = 1
 @>Control Switches: [0112: Female Avatar Selected] = ON
 @>Script: $player.outfit=1
 @>Script: pbSet(102,"MORGAN")
 @>Script: pbSet(103,"Morgan")
 @>Show Picture: 2, 'introCharSel2', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
 @>
: Branch End
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bIs this the correct photo to upload? Remember, this 
 :    : can be changed later at any Pokémon Center if need 
 :    : be.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bIs this correct?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Control Switches: [0111: Male Avatar Selected] = OFF
 @>Control Switches: [0112: Female Avatar Selected] = OFF
 @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = -1
 @>Text: \w[signskin]\bPlease upload the correct photo.
 @>Jump to Label: Who are you?
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Fade Out BGM: 5 sec.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bNext, please fill out your Date of Birth\..\..\..\.\^
@>Comment: That text auto ends after a short period, while the 
 :       : screen fades to black.
@>Comment: At this point, the screen transitions to the player in 
 :       : their room, staring at the computer.
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Change Opacity: 255
@>Transfer Player:[050: Grace Family Household], (005,009), Left
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Text: \w[signskin]\b...Wonderful! Your application has been completed!
@>Text: \w[signskin]\b\PN, according to your IP Address, your appliation 
 :    : has been sent to the closest regional professor, 
 :    : which is Professor Jeremiah Hawthorn of the Yitria 
 :    : Region.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bOnce properly processed, you shall recieve your 
 :    : trainer card, as well as your first Pokémon.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bAre you ready, \PN?
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bYour very own story is about to unfold.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bFun times, tough challenges, these all lie ahead on 
 :    : your journey.
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bBut, with your partners by your side, there is nothing 
 :    : you can't overcome!
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bA world of dreams and adventures await you, it's 
 :    : time to take your first steps into it!
@>Text: \w[signskin]\bThis AI system was brought to you by
 :    : the Infinity Corporation, which...\^
@>Script: $player.has_pokegear = true
:       : $player.has_running_shoes = true
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Script: completeQuest(:Quest1)
@>Play ME: 'Register phone', 100, 100
@>Text: \se[Register phone]\w[dark]You sent in your registration for the Yitria League!\wtnp[40]
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: \xn[???]Hey, \PN! Come downstairs, mom wants you!
@>Show Animation: Player, [Exclaim bubble]
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch2(50,34,"A",true)
@>Script: $bag.add(:POTION,1)
@>Script: activateQuest(:Quest2)
@>Text: \w[dark]Your Quest Journal has been updated! You can view 
 :    : the Quest Journal from the pause menu.
@>Text: \w[dark]You can also look for quest objectives in the 
 :    : overworld by looking for an icon over them.
@>Comment: ----------------- End of Intro
@>

Page #1

List of Event Commands:
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
@>Prepare for Transition
@>Play BGM: 'Oak's Theme', 50, 100
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Execute Transition
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 2, 'introBG1', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @15, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @15, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Text: Hello, and welcome to the Pokémon League 
 :    : Registration Website, I am an AI designed
 :    : in the likeness of Professor Oak.
@>Text: I will be your guide through the process of registering
 :    : for the Pokémon League Challenge.
@>Text: This world is inhabited by three prominent species. 
 :    : Humans, individuals like you and I...
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 4, 'introEevee', Center (170,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 4, @10, Center (170,220), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Play SE: 'Intro Eevee Cry', 80, 100
@>Text: Pokémon, creatures that have existed for as long as 
 :    : we can remember...
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 5, 'introGoliath', Center (342,210), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 5, @10, Center (342,210), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Play SE: 'Intro Goliath Cry', 80, 100
@>Text: And Puppets, a more recent addition to the critters of 
 :    : our world, but a welcomed one all the same.
@>Text: Though Puppets are indeed a prominent fixture of the
 :    : world these days, they don't exist in every corner
 :    : of the world yet.
@>Text: For several decades, these three species have existed
 :    : together in harmony.
@>Text: Humans cohabitate with Pokémon and Puppets, they 
 :    : support one another, complement one another.
@>Text: Most of our world revolves around the bond that we 
 :    : share with these creatures!
@>Move Picture: 4, @10, Center (170,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 5, @10, Center (342,210), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 4
@>Erase Picture: 5
@>Text: But, even to this day, we don't know everything 
 :    : about these remarkable creatures.
@>Text: Where they came from, how they've persisted all 
 :    : these years... There's so many mysteries to solve.
@>Text: That's why we study them every day.
@>Move Picture: 3, @20, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Text: Now, it's time for you to submit the information for 
 :    : your trainer card.
@>Text: Please answer the following questions to the best of 
 :    : your ability.
@>Text: First off, please fill out your name in the relevant 
 :    : fields. Do note, this cannot be changed later.
@>Label: Enter Name
@>Script: pbTrainerName
@>Text: \PN. Is this the correct name? Remember, this cannot 
 :    : be changed later.
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: Please fill out your name.
 @>Jump to Label: Enter Name
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),20)
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introCharSel', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 1, @20, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),20)
@>Comment: Transtion to avatar select screen
@>Script: pbChangePlayer(0)
@>Text: \PN, please upload a photo to go along with your 
 :    : trainer card application.

 :    : when you come to claim your trainer card.

 :    : \ch[1,0,IMG_5281,IMG_5347]

List of Event Commands:
@>Prepare for Transition
@>Play BGM: 'static', 50, 100
@>Show Picture: 1, 'introbg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Execute Transition
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Show Picture: 2, 'introbase', Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 2, @15, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @15, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 18 frame(s)
@>Text: Hello! Sorry to keep you waiting!
@>Text: Welcome to Monsekai, home to Pokemon and Puppets 
 :    : alike!
@>Text: My name is Oak.
@>Text: Many years ago, I used to be a Professor who 
 :    : studied Pokemon and Puppets, but now the newer 
 :    : generation carries on my work.
@>Text: I now live on as an automated Artificial Inteligence 
 :    : system, designed to help indoctrinate new trainers.
@>Label: Help Choices
@>Text: If you need help, I am certainly capable of giving it.
@>Show Choices: Controls, Adventure, No info needed
(When Cancel: Choice 3)
: When [Controls]
 @>Script: pbEventScreen(ButtonEventScene)
 @>Jump to Label: Help Choices
 @>
: When [Adventure]
 @>Text: Well then, without further ado...
 @>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(-255,-255,-255,0),10)
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Show Picture: 4, 'helpadventurebg', Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>Move Picture: 4, @10, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Change Text Options: Middle, Hide
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[3]You are about to enter a world\nwhere 
  :    : you will embark on a grand\nadventure of your very 
  :    : own.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[5]Speak to people and check things\n
  :    : wherever you go, be it in towns,\nroads or caves.\n
  :    : Gather information and hints from\n
  :    : every possible source.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[3]New paths will open to you when\n
  :    : you help people in need, overcome\n
  :    : challenges, and solve mysteries.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[7]At times, you will be challenged\n
  :    : by others to a battle.\n
  :    : At other times, wild creatures\nmay stand in your way.\n\n
  :    : By overcoming such hurdles,\nyou will gain great power.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[2]However, your adventure is not\n
  :    : solely about becoming powerful.
 @>Text: <ac>\c[0]\l[7]On your travels, we hope that\n
  :    : you will meet countless people\n
  :    : and, through them, achieve\npersonal growth.\n\n
  :    : This is the most important\nobjective of this adventure.
 @>Move Picture: 4, @10, Upper Left (0,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Erase Picture: 4
 @>Script: pbToneChangeAll(Tone.new(0,0,0,0),10)
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Change Text Options: Bottom, Show
 @>Jump to Label: Help Choices
 @>
: When [No info needed]
 @>
: Branch End
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introMarill', Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: This world is inhabited by two specific species. The 
 :    : first is Pokemon.
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,220), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, '642', Center (256,190), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,190), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Text: And the other is Puppets, a recent arrival to the 
 :    : beings residing on Monsekai.
@>Text: For several hundred years, people have lived 
 :    : together with Pokemon and Puppets, supporting one 
 :    : another.
@>Text: Some play with them like friends, some battle with 
 :    : them like comrades, they both go hand in hand.
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,190), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Show Picture: 3, 'introOak', Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: But we don't know everything about these 
 :    : remarkable creatures yet.
@>Text: There are still many mysteries to solve.
@>Text: That's why we study them every day.
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 2, @10, Center (256,256), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @10, Center (256,172), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Text: Now it's time for you to fill out your identification card. 
 :    : Please answer the following questions to the best of 
 :    : your ability.
@>Text: First off, are you male or female?
@>Text: Please select from the list.\ch[1,0,Male,Female]
@>Label: Who are you?
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 0

 :       : trainer object

 :    : registration website from Pharos City, Yitria Region.

 :    : able to pick up your first Pokemon.

@>Text: You'll face fun times and tough challenges.
@>Text: A world of dreams and adventures with your partners
 :    : awaits!  Let's go!

 :    : forgotten anything...

 :              : $>Turn Right

 :    : check to see what they want.

Event ID: 005
Event Name: Intro - Backup (new)
(X,Y): (015,014)

Page #1
Conditions

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low

 :    : trainer! Tell me, have you heard of the Sandbox Zone?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \xn[Mysterious Lady]Excellent! Then this makes it easier for 
  :    : me to get down to business.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \xn[Mysterious Lady]I thought not, it's not a story most 
  :    : history books would tell you.
 @>Text: \xn[Mysterious Lady]The Sandbox Zone was the name of a 
  :    : market project that aimed to provide trainers with a wide 
  :    : variety of services.
 @>Text: \xn[Mysterious Lady]Groups of people would gather in one 
  :    : location and open up shops and stalls to allow trainers to use 
  :    : them.
 @>Text: \xn[Mysterious Lady]Unfortunately, the practice didn't really 
  :    : pick up speed. It only really saw scattered deployment in the 
  :    : Hoenn Region over 50 years ago.
 @>Text: \xn[Mysterious Lady]However, the concept fascinated me, 
  :    : and for years I've been trying to revive it.
 @>Text: \xn[Mysterious Lady]As of today, I finally got all the paperwork 
  :    : I needed to open one up here checked over and verified! 
  :    : However, that's only the first step.
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: \xn[Mysterious Lady]Where are my maners though! My name
 :    : is Pandora.
@>Text: \xn[Pandora]Anyways! I can't run the Sandbox Zone all by 
 :    : myself. I need others who would be willing to help out.
@>Text: \xn[Pandora]However, I'm going to be working with the 
 :    : construction team to help set up the perfect base of 
 :    : operations.
@>Text: \xn[Pandora]That's why I need you to help me out.
@>Text: \xn[Pandora]I wager you're on a journey across the region, 
 :    : right? Well, if you see anybody on your travels who might be 
 :    : able to help, have them come here!
@>Text: \xn[Pandora]If you want my advice, the best place to start 
 :    : would be around Veiskille City. There's bound to be 
 :    : someone there who can help us move goods!

 :    : me out!

 :    : Aside from the indicator over Pandora, you will have to

@>Comment: Notes for the Yitria League:
@>Comment: Each of the Elite 4 members cannot be interacted with, 
 :       : but instead you activate their fights by walking over a scrpted 
 :       : tile
@>Comment: (This is so I can shoehorn in the Pre-Battle theme without 
 :       : breaking music)
@>Comment: Cecilia's will be the most blatant example of this; her room is 
 :       : the courtyard of a castle, and she's up on a balcony. She 
 :       : tells you to "come forth" if you wish to challenge her, and 
 :       : step into the arena.
@>Comment: Elizabeth is a similar case, where her room is a giant lab, and
 :       : she's behind a glass wall. She calls you a "test subject", says
 :       : some brief remarks about the Enigma Brigade, the Robo Liz,
 :       : and how none of it matters, and that she's going to test you
 :       : herself. She'll also talk about her own ambitions and dreams,
 :       : but I can't fit that all here.
@>Comment: I... haven't thought of anything for Chester or Mitchell yet.
 :       : We'll burn those bridges when we come to them!
@>

Event ID: 002
Event Name: Alyssia trigger
(X,Y): (043,034)

Page #1
Conditions
Switch 0120:  is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Event Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Trigger for Alyssia fight
@>Set Move Route: [Alyssia]
 :              : $>Through ON
@>Set Event Location: [Alyssia],(043,025)
@>Set Move Route: [Alyssia]
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Move Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Show Animation: [Alyssia], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Wait: 4 frame(s)
@>Play BGM: '009. Rival Appearance', 100, 100
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "Oh, \\pn! What are you doing here?")
@>Set Move Route: [Alyssia]
 :              : $>Move Down
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Up
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "I'm here on assignment from Lifrana, actually. She sent me here to check
:       : out what the commotion was.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "Apparently some group called the Enigma Brigade has been showing up all over
:       : the Yitria Region, and while it appears they haven't done anything too bad...")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "Well, Lifrana's a bit cautious! Can't fully blame her I suppose!")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "So, have you seen anyone that goes by that affiliation?")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "... Oh, you already helped deal with them? Huh. I guess I just missed them.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "Oh well I suppose! I just came out here for nothing then!")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "Actually, \\pn, it's been a while, hasn't it?")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "I did imply you should be prepared for the next time we met, after all!")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "But, your Pokémon are looking mighty tired, and I don't want to battle a weakened
:       : team, so...")
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>Script: TrainerIntro2(:APPRENTICE)
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "There, now your party's all healed up and ready for a round!")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Alyssia",
:       : "Now get ready, \\pn! I'm coming hard and fast!")
@>Control Switches: [0122] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0113: Vs. Transition - Badge] = 0
@>Control Variables: [0114: Vs. Transition - Leader] = 3
@>Comment: EndSpeech: W-Well, you've certainly gotten stronger!
@>Script: setBattleRule("canLose")
@>Script: setBattleRule("outcome", 112)

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (013,012)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemon_count
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: get_character(3).pattern = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: for i in 1..$player.pokemon_count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [ExitArrow]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: get_character(4).pattern = 0
@>Set Move Route: [ExitArrow]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 010
Event Name: Relay Receptionist
(X,Y): (012,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC_Teala

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This leads to the Regional Teleporter Relay.
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0114: Relay Explained] == ON
 @>Control Switches: [0114: Relay Explained] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]
  @>Call Common Event: Explain Relay
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Relay Use
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<4
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Wonderful! Allow me to show you downstairs, then.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[048: Pharos Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 : Branch End
 @>Comment: --- Enables Debug Mode
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_variables[111]==91036093
  @>Script: $DEBUG=true
  @>Text: \bDebug Mode has been enabled. Please use it 
   :    : responsibly.
  @>Text: \bThis code will have to be reapplied each time you 
   :    : reload the game.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \bInvalid passcode. Please try again.
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (013,012)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: This line of code sets the player's current position as 
 :       : the spot they will return to after they lose a battle 
 :       : and lack out.
 :       : Page 2 of this event detects when this happens, and 
 :       : heals the player's Pokémon and wishes them better 
 :       : luck in future.
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count = $player.pokemon_count
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6, i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: get_character(3).pattern = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Every map you can end up in after having all your 
 :       : Pokémon faint (typically Poké Centers and home) 
 :       : must have an Autorun event in it like this one.
 :       : This event fully heals all the player's Pokémon, says 
 :       : something to that effect, and turns the "Starting 
 :       : over" switch OFF again.
@>Comment: For convenience, this can be a single page in an 
 :       : NPC's event (e.g. Mom, a nurse).
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: for i in 1..$player.pokemon_count
:       :   pbSet(6, i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: []
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: get_character(4).pattern = 0
@>Set Move Route: []
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

Speed: 3: Slow

Options Enabled

@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0114: Relay Explained] == ON
 @>Control Switches: [0114: Relay Explained] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]
  @>Call Common Event: Explain Relay
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Relay Use
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<4
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Wonderful! Allow me to show you downstairs, then.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6

  @>Transfer Player:[052: Veiskille Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again!
 @>

 : Else

 @>Comment: --- Red/Blue Costume
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0111: Pandora Variable] == 2271996
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0113: Dunsparce Sidequest Cleared] == ON
   @>Text: \b"The Classics" outfit set has already been
    :    : unlocked. This code cannot be used.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Else
   @>Control Switches: [0113: Dunsparce Sidequest Cleared] = ON
   @>Text: \b"The Classics" Outfit set unlocked.
    :    : You can change into these outfits from the second
    :    : floor of any Pokemon Center.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: --- Rebattle MissingNo.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0111: Pandora Variable] == 5001999
  @>Comment: --- Checks for if Round 2 of Kotonoji has happened.
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0096] == ON
   @>Comment: --- Checks for if MissingNo. is atop Mt. Fuguai.
   @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0096] == OFF
    @>Text: \bMissingNo. can now be rebattled atop Mt. Fuguai.
    @>Control Switches: [0096] = ON
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \bMissingNo. is already present at Mt. Fuguai. This
     :    : code cannot be used.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \bConditions not met to use this passode. Please
    :    : try again later.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: --- Shadow Lugia fight
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0111: Pandora Variable] == 4151993
  @>Comment: --- Checks for if player has reached the Shrine of the 
   :       : Mystics.
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0096] == ON
   @>Comment: --- Checks for if there is a Legendary waiting in the 
    :       : Shrine of the Mystics' Atrium.
   @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0096] == OFF
    @>Text: \bA special colored Lugia can now be battled at
     :    : the Shrine of the Mystics.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Else
    @>Text: \bA Pokemon is already present at the Shrine of the 
     :    : Mystics' Atrium. This code cannot be used.
    @>Exit Event Processing
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Else
   @>Text: \bConditions not met to use this passode. Please
    :    : try again later.
   @>Exit Event Processing
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: --- Primal Dialga fight
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $game_variables[111]==15041993
  @>Comment: --- Checks for if player has reached the Shrine of the 
   :       : Mystics.
  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0096] == ON
   @>Comment: --- Checks for if there is a Legendary waiting in the 
    :       : Shrine of the Mystics' Atrium.

 @>Comment: --- Enables Debug Mode

   :    : responsibly.

   :    : reload the game.

 :    : Try it out?

(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]

 @>Input Number: [0111: Pandora Variable], 7 digit(s)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0072] == 5112017
  @>Text: \bThis will open "Pandora's Box", skipping all the relevant
   :    : sidequests to unlock it and putting it in a finished state.
  @>Text: \bIs this acceptable?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Text: \b"Pandora's Box" has been opened. You can access
    :    : it from the beach in Pharos City.

   @>
  : Branch End

 : Else
  @>Text: INCORRECT.

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 036
Event Name: Changing Room
(X,Y): (011,026)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: doors8

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Would you like to change outfits?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Set Move Route: This event
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>SE: 'Automatic Door', 100, 100
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Right
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Up
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Set Move Route: Player
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Through ON
  :              : $>Move Up
  :              : $>Through OFF
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
 @>Set Move Route: This event
                   (Ignore If Can't Move)
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Right
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

Map ID: 053
Map Name: Kortalan Pokemon Center
Tileset: 004: Poke Center
Width: 71, Height: 55
Auto-Change BGM: 006. PokeCenter

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (011,012)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",true)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",false)
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0001: Starting over is ON

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Autorun

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rFirst, you should restore your Pokémon to full 
 :    : health.
@>Recover All: Entire Party
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",true)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Script: for i in 1..$player.pokemonCount
:       :   pbSet(6,i)
:       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
:       :   pbWait(16)
:       : end
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
 :              : $>Stop Animation ON
@>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
@>Wait: 58 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
@>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
 :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rYour Pokémon have been healed to perfect health.
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: \rWe hope you excel!
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",false)
@>Control Switches: [0001: Starting over] = OFF
@>

  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(4,"A",true)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (R)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (R)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(4,"A",false)

(X,Y): (012,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 22

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This leads to the Regional Teleporter Relay.
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0104: Transition Handler] == OFF
 @>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]
  @>Call Common Event: -----------
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Relay Use
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<5
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Wonderful! Allow me to show you downstairs, then.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[048: Pharos Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]

  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>

  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!

  @>
 : Else

  @>Transfer Player:[048: Pharos Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]

 @>

  :    : to you.

 : When [Explain]

  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>

@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?

(When Cancel: Choice 2)

   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.

   :    : will consider using our services in the future!

  @>
 : Else

 @>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]

  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]

 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<4
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Wonderful! Allow me to show you downstairs, then.

  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[056: Yozora Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

  @>Conditional Branch: Switch [0110: Prevent Capture Switch] == ON

    @>

   @>
  : Branch End

Event ID: 010
Event Name: Relay Receptionist
(X,Y): (012,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 22

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This leads to the Regional Teleporter Relay.
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0104: Transition Handler] == OFF
 @>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]
  @>Call Common Event: -----------
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Relay Use
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<5
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Wonderful! Allow me to show you downstairs, then.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[048: Pharos Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

(X,Y): (011,012)

Page #1
Conditions

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",true)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",false)
@>

Event ID: 010
Event Name: Relay Receptionist
(X,Y): (012,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 22

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This leads to the Regional Teleporter Relay.
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0104: Transition Handler] == OFF
 @>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]
  @>Call Common Event: -----------
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Relay Use
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<5
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Wonderful! Allow me to show you downstairs, then.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[048: Pharos Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Autonomous Movement

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",true)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",false)

  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]
  @>Call Common Event: -----------
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Relay Use
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<5
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else

  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6

  @>Transfer Player:[048: Pharos Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down

  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]

   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.

   :    : exceptionally well.

  :    : to you.

  @>Exit Event Processing

   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.

   :    : will consider using our services in the future!

Page #1
Conditions

Graphic: 206

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Stop Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(7,"A",true)
@>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:DUNSPARCE)
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn toward Player
@>Wait: 20 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0118: Unique Pokemon Encs.] = 0
@>Script: setBattleRule("disablePokeBalls")
@>Script: pkmn = pbGenerateWildPokemon(:DUNSPARCE, 4)
:       : pkmn.add_first_move(:FURYATTACK)
:       : pkmn.learn_move(:FURYATTACK)
:       : $game_variables[2] = pkmn
:       : WildBattle.start(pkmn)
@>Set Move Route: This event
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Control Variables: [0118: Unique Pokemon Encs.] = 0
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] == 1
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn toward Player
 @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:DUNSPARCE)
 @>Set Event Location: [Dad],(027,010)
 @>Set Move Route: [Dad]
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Direction Fix ON
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Move Left
  :              : $>Move Left
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Text: \xn[Dad]Looks like you have everything handled back here, \PN!
 @>Set Move Route: Player
  :              : $>Turn Right
 @>Text: \xn[Dad]I calmed down all the Dunsparce back at the front, 
  :    : so things should return to normal.
 @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:DUNSPARCE)
 @>Wait: 40 frame(s)
 @>Script: Pokemon.play_cry(:DUNSPARCE)
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Text: \xn[Dad]Oh? It appears this Dunsparce wants to join you, \PN! 
  :    : Looks it's going to take no for an answer, either!
 @>Script: pbAddPokemon(pbGet(2))
 @>Set Move Route: [Dunsparce]
  :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
 @>Text: \xn[Dad]Alright, since that's been taken care of, let's get out 
  :    : of here, \PN. No sense lingering any longer than we need to.
 @>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
 @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
 @>Script: pbCaveExit
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(2,"A",true)
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"B",true)
 @>Control Switches: [0102: Special Battle Switch] = OFF
 @>Control Variables: [0118: Unique Pokemon Encs.] = 0
 @>Control Switches: [0109: Special KO Message] = OFF
 @>Control Variables: [0102: Special Battle Variable] = 0
 @>Transfer Player:[003: Pharos City], (055,025), Down, No Fade
 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6

Event ID: 009
Event Name: Nurse
(X,Y): (012,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Stairs up (L-to-R)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Stairs up (L-to-R)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 023
Event Name: Safari Zone Notes
(X,Y): (019,011)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: The Safari Zone scripts will switch between two states
 :       : - If you're exploring the undersea ruins, the step counter
 :       :   will act as a breath counter, and have a total of 600(?)
 :       :   This can be artificially extended by finding single-use
 :       :   oxygen-replenishing machines underwater.
@>Comment: - There will be checkpoints you can reach where your
 :       :   air tanks will be completely restored (as this ends the
 :       :   "Safari Game" instance), and you can choose to
 :       :   progress onward, or go backwards.
@>Comment: - It will either cost no money to explore the Undersea Ruins, 
 :       :   or it will cost $2000. The argument for such an expensive 
 :       :   cost is because, within the Undersea Ruins will be a great 
 :       :   multitude of rare items, including Dig Spots which will also 
 :       :   give out rare items.
@>Comment: - At the end of the Undersea Ruins will be a sealed cavern, 
 :       :   one that can only be opened by solving a puzzle of some
 :       :   kind. Within those sealed caverns are extremely rare
 :       :   loot, and in one of them will be the legendary Pokemon,
 :       :   Kyogre.
@>Comment: - When you run out of Oxygen for the Oxygen Tanks 
 :       :   when exploring the Undersea Ruins, you'll get a message 
 :       :   that goes along the lines of:
 :       :   "WARNING: Your Oxygen Tank is running low. You
 :       :    have enough estimated Oxygen to return to your
 :       :    last checkpoint. Please do so now."
@>Comment: - At each Checkpoint, there will be an NPC who
 :       :   will offer to escort you back to the entrance
 :       :   of the ruins, so you don't have to make the
 :       :   long treck back manually.
@>Comment: - PokeIsland Park will remove the step counter, and you'll
 :       :   have an infinite time limit within the park, until you run
 :       :   out of Safari Balls. You will also recieve 60 Safari Balls
 :       :   before entering the Park.
@>Comment: - PokeIsland Park is inspired by HgSs's Safari Zone,
 :       :   except instead of configuring the Safari Zone to
 :       :   your whims, you pick one of three Islands to go
 :       :   to, and explore four different, diverse biomes,
 :       :   each with their own unique wild Pokemon.
 :       :   (Some Pokemon may be shared, maybe.)
@>Comment: - PokeIsland Park will have an increased chance of
 :       :   encountering a Shiny Pokemon, though I haven't
 :       :   decided on by how much.
@>Comment: - There will be certain unique and rare stationary
 :       :   encounters in PokeIsland Park. For example,
 :       :   within the junkyard is a TV that has a Rotom in it
 :       :   if you go there at night.
@>Comment: - Each of the three islands has four different biomes
 :       :   on it, all to make for a unique exploration experience.
 :       :   However, you can only go to one Island per trip.
 :       :   If you wish to go to another Island, you will have to
 :       :   leave and pay the entrance fee again.
@>Comment: - Ball count is handled at the receptionist, as is cost.
@>Comment: https://i.imgur.com/tiAsVjN.png
 :       : - These lines are important when making the distinction edits for 
 :       :   the two different Safari Zones.
@>

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: Object ball

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbShowPokedexEntry(:BULBASAUR)
@>Text: Is your choice the Seed Pokémon, Bulbasaur?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Script: p=Pokemon.new(:BULBASAUR,5,$player)
 :       : p.item=:ORANBERRY
 :       : p.calc_stats
 :       : p.reset_moves
 :       : 
 :       : pbAddPokemon(p)
 @>Control Switches: [0003: Starter Chosen] = ON
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Switch 0003: Starter Chosen is ON

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

@>Text: Probably shouldn't take more than Pokémon.

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 018
Event Name: size(3,1)
(X,Y): (019,014)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:
@>Scroll Map: Up, 6, 3
@>Text: \xn[???]If there's one thing we can learn from Enderos, it's 
 :    : that we should always be willing to stand up to protect that 
 :    : which we hold dear! Remember that!
@>Text: \xn[???]And that is the story of the Great Schism! Thank you 
 :    : all for coming out here today, it was a pleasure seeing all of 
 :    : you and have you listen to my tale!
@>Text: \xn[???]Professor Hawthorn, if you would?
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]Ahem! Unfortunately, Lorekeeper Lifrana will have to 
 :    : be returning back to her gym in Kortalan City, so she will not 
 :    : be around for much longer.
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]If you have anything to say to her, please 
 :    : do so now before you leave!
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]When you leave, please remember to make
 :    : sure you have everything you arrived with.
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]Thank you all for coming out to Storytime 
 :    : with the Lorekeepers!
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Control Variables: [0107: Plot Control Variable] = 3
@>Set Event Location: [Lifrana],(024,004), Right
@>Set Event Location: [Hawthorne],(026,004), Left
@>Transfer Player:[113: Pharos City Library], (025,008), Up
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>Text: \xn[Lifrana]Thanks for coming out again Jeremiah! 
 :    : The person I had lined up initially had called in sick a few 
 :    : days ago, so I really appreciate it.
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]Think nothing of it! Most evey child looks 
 :    : forward to Storytime with the Lorekeepers, it was just the 
 :    : least I could do!
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Show Animation: [Hawthorne], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]Oh, \PN! I didn't realize you would be here. 
 :    : Though, I do suppose today is the day, isn't it.
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Text: \xn[Lifrana]Is this the person you were telling me about 
 :    : earlier, Professor?
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]It is indeed! This is \pn Grace, and they're 
 :    : starting their gym circuit challenge today.
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Text: \xn[Lifrana]Grace, Grace... That name rings a bell...
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Show Animation: [Lifrana], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Text: \xn[Lifrana]Oh! Would you happen to be related to former
 :    : Champion-Elect Dist Grace?
@>Text: \xn[Lifrana]Well, my name is Lifrana Sevaria, leader of Kortalan 
 :    : Gym. If you're anything like your brother was, I'm sure I'll be 
 :    : seeing you before too long!
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Comment: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]She's also one of the Mouths of Arceus, 
 :       : an order of individuals appointed by Arceus to oversee 
 :       : particular regions of the world while It slumbers.
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]She's also head of the Lorekeepers, an
 :    : organization that chronicles the history of the world, a task she
 :    : able to efficently undertake due to being a Mouth of Arceus.
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]I tell you, Lifrana! Despite your unique 
 :    : positions, it's incredible that you can find time to read stories 
 :    : to the children!
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Text: \xn[Lifrana]Haha, I'm not all that busy! Yitria's a mostly safe 
 :    : region, and I don't get a whole lot of challengers. Most of 
 :    : them tend to stall out by Serafina's gym.
@>Text: \xn[Lifrana]I'd say I have more time to myself than I know 
 :    : what to do with!
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]Perhaps we can continue this conversation on the way back to the lab.
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]Afterall, it wouldn't do to keep \PN waiting any longer.
@>Show Animation: [Lifrana], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Text: \xn[Lifrana]Oh, of course! I also have someone I'm waiting on 
 :    : before I can depart back for Kortalan, so I'll just tell them 
 :    : where to meet up.
@>Text: \xn[Prof. Hawthorn]Well then, let's get a move on!
@>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Transfer Player:[073: Professor Hawthorn's Lab], (024,011), Up, No Fade
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

@>Text: ???: Suddenly, the ground began to shake and split! 
 :    : Everyone was in a panic!
@>Text: Fortunately, the protectors of Yitria Village managed 
 :    : to safeguard everyone and get them to safety!
@>Text: When they went back to the site of the battle, they 
 :    : couldn't find Enderos or the Wandering Mage 
 :    : anywhere, they had vanished completely.
@>Text: To this day, nobody knows what happened to either 
 :    : of them...
@>Text: Some say that Enderos died protecting the people of 
 :    : Yitria. Some say that he continues to chase down 
 :    : the Wandering Mage, even in death.
@>Text: One thing is for certain, it was his bravery and 
 :    : courage, and the bravery of those back then, that 
 :    : saved Yitria Village from destruction.
@>Text: If there's one thing we can learn from Enderos, it's 
 :    : that we should always be willing to stand up to 
 :    : protect that which we hold dear! Remember that!
@>Text: And that is the story of the Great Schism! Thank you 
 :    : all for coming out here today, it was a pleasure 
 :    : seeing all of you and have you listen to my tale!
@>Text: Professor Hawthorne, if you would?
@>Text: Hawthorne: Ahem! Unfortunately, Lorekeeper Lifrana 
 :    : will have to be returning back to her gym in Kortalan 
 :    : City, so she will not be around for much longer.
@>Text: If you have anything to say to her, please do so now 
 :    : before you leave!
@>Text: When you leave, please remember to make sure you 
 :    : have everything you arrived with. Thank you all for 
 :    : coming out to Storytime with the Lorekeepers!
@>

@>Script: pbMessageWithName("???",
:       : "If there's one thing we can learn from Enderos, it's that we should always be 
:       : willing to stand up to protect that which we hold dear! Remember that!")

:       : "And that is the story of the Great Schism! Thank you all for coming out here today,
:       : it was a pleasure seeing all of you and have you listen to my tale!") 
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("???",
:       : "Professor Hawthorn, if you would?") 
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",
:       : "Ahem! Unfortunately, Lorekeeper Lifrana will have to be returning back to her gym
:       : in Kortalan City, so she will not be around for much longer.")

@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",

@>Set Event Location: [Hawthorne],(026,004), Left
@>Transfer Player:[113: Pharos City Library], (025,008), Up
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Thanks for coming out again Jerimiah! The person I had lined up initially had called
:       : in sick a few days ago, so I really appreciate it.") 
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",
:       : "Think nothing of it! Most evey child looks forward to Storytime with the
:       : Lorekeepers, it was just the least I could do!") 
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Show Animation: [Hawthorne], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",
:       : "Oh, \\PN! I didn't realize you would be here. Though, I do suppose today is the
:       : day, isn't it.")
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Is this the person you were telling me about earlier, Professor?") 
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",
:       : "It is indeed! This is \\pn Grace, and they're starting their gym circuit
:       : challenge today.") 
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Grace, huh? That's a last name I haven't heard in a while... Related to former
:       : Champion-Elect Dist Grace then, I assume?") 
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Well, my name is Lifrana Sevaria, leader of Kortalan Gym. If you're anything like
:       : your brother was, I'm sure I'll be seeing you before too long!")
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",

:       : by Arceus to oversee particular regions of the world while it slumbers.")
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",
:       : "I tell you, Lifrana! Despite your unique positions, it's incredible that
:       : you can find time to read stories to the children!")
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Haha, I'm not all that busy! Yitria's a mostly safe region, and I don't get a
:       : whole lot of challengers. Most of them tend to stall out by Serafina's gym.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "I'd say I have more time to myself than I know what to do with!")
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",
:       : "Perhaps we can continue this conversation on the way back to the lab.")
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",
:       : "Afterall, it wouldn't do to keep \\PN waiting any longer.")
@>Show Animation: [Lifrana], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Oh, of course! I also have someone I'm waiting on before I can depart back for
:       : Kortalan, so I'll just tell them where to meet up.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorn",
:       : "Well then, let's get a move on!")
@>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6

:       : "The time has finally come to select my first Pokémon! I should think this over carefully...")
@>Script: pbSetQuestObj(2,"Pick out a Pokémon.")
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

 :    : do suppose today is the day, isn't it.

 :    : earlier, professor?

 :              : $>Turn Left

 :    : starting their gym circuit challenge today.

 :    : Gym, as well as head of the Lorekeepers.

 :              : $>Turn Down

 :    : individuals that chronicle the history of Yitria, as well 
 :    : as protect the region from danger.

 :    : group of individuals tasked with maintaining the world 
 :    : while Arceus slumbers.

 :              : $>Turn Left

 :    : still have time to read stories to the kids!

 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Text: Lifrana: Haha, I'm not all that busy! Yitria's a mostly 
 :    : safe region, and I don't get a whole lot of 
 :    : challengers.

 :    : do with!

 :    : conversation on the way back to the lab.

 :              : $>Turn Down

@>Show Animation: [Lifrana], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Text: Lifrana: Oh, of course! I also have someone I'm 
 :    : waiting on before I can depart back for Kortalan, so 
 :    : I'll just tell them where to meet up.
@>Text: Hawthorne: Well then, let's get a move on!

@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Transfer Player:[073: Professor Hawthorn's Lab], (024,011), Up, No Fade

@>

:       : "If there's one thing we can learn from Enderos, it's that we should always be 
:       : willing to stand up to protect that which we hold dear! Remember that!")

:       : it was a pleasure seeing all of you and have you listen to my tale!")

 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
