 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "Ahem! Unfortunately, Lorekeeper Lifrana will have to be returning back to her gym
:       : in Kortalan City, so she will not be around for much longer.") 
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "If you have anything to say to her, please do so now before you leave!") 
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "When you leave, please remember to make sure you have everything you arrived with.") 
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "Thank you all for coming out to Storytime with the Lorekeepers!") 
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Control Switches: [0105: Prevent Capture Switch] = ON
@>Set Event Location: [Lifrana],(024,004), Right
@>Set Event Location: [Hawthorne],(026,004), Left
@>Transfer Player:[113: Pharos City Library], (025,008), Up
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Thanks for coming out again Jerimiah! The person I had lined up initially had called
:       : in sick a few days ago, so I really appreciate it.") 
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "Think nothing of it! Most evey child looks forward to Storytime with the
:       : Lorekeepers, it was just the least I could do!") 
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Show Animation: [Hawthorne], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "Oh, \\PN! I didn't realize you would be here. Though, I do suppose today is the
:       : day, isn't it.")
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Is this the person you were telling me about earlier, Professor?") 
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "It is indeed! This is \\pn Grace, and they're starting their gym circuit
:       : challenge today.") 
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Grace, huh? That's a last name I haven't heard in a while... Related to former
:       : Champion-Elect Dist Grace then, I assume?") 
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Well, my name is Lifrana Sevaria, leader of Kortalan Gym, as well as head of the
:       : Lorekeepers.")
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "The Lorekeepers are a group of individuals that chronicle the history of Yitria,
:       : as well as protect the region from danger.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "I'm also a Mouth of Arceus, which is a small group of individuals tasked with
:       : maintaining the world while Arceus slumbers.") 
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "You live quite the active life, and yet you still have time to read stories to the kids!")
@>Set Move Route: [Lifrana]
 :              : $>Turn Right
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Haha, I'm not all that busy! Yitria's a mostly safe region, and I don't get a
:       : whole lot of challengers.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "I'd say I have more time to myself than I know what to do with!")
@>Wait: 10 frame(s)
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "Perhaps we can continue this conversation on the way back to the lab.")
@>Set Move Route: [Hawthorne]
 :              : $>Turn Down
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "Afterall, it wouldn't do to keep \\PN waiting any longer.")
@>Show Animation: [Lifrana], [Exclaim bubble]
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Lifrana",
:       : "Oh, of course! I also have someone I'm waiting on before I can depart back for
:       : Kortalan, so I'll just tell them where to meet up.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Prof. Hawthorne",
:       : "Well then, let's get a move on!")
@>Play SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Transfer Player:[073: Professor Hawthorn's Lab], (024,011), Up, No Fade
@>Script: pbSetQuest(3,true)
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

Event ID: 003
Event Name: Gym Terminal
(X,Y): (016,018)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: gymtelecom

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Right
 @>Text: Accessing Gym Network.
 @>Label: Start
 @>Text: Please select what you want to know about.
 @>Show Choices: Gym Pokemon Preference, Gym Puzzle, Gym Leader Information, Nothing
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [Gym Pokemon Preference]
  @>Text: The Veiskille City Gym does not have a type preference.
   :    : The leader, Lazarus, prefers to use more varied Pokémon.
  @>Text: This will usually come in the form of Pokemon that are
   :    : influenced by Humankind in some fashion.
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : When [Gym Puzzle]
  @>Text: In order to progress through the gym, challengers will
   :    : have to reactivate conveyor belts that will convoy them
   :    : across the factory.
  @>Text: The method of reactivating them is by flipping switches
   :    : found throughout the gym.
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : When [Gym Leader Information]
  @>Text: The Gym Leader, Lazarus, is an android that was designed
   :    : by Team Rocket during their twilight years.
  @>Text: Lazarus's original purpose was to steal Pokémon
   :    : from trainers. However, after an incident which
   :    : reset their memory banks, it no longer abides by
   :    : this.
  @>Text: Outside of being a Gym Leader, Lazarus also volunteers
   :    : at the Day Care center north of Veiskille City. 
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : When [Nothing]
  @>Text: Shutting down information database.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Event ID: 022
Event Name: Hidden Power Checker
(X,Y): (041,011)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trainer_SCIENTIST

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Self Switch A == ON
 @>Text: Ah, you've returned!
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: Ah, say not a word! I know exactly why you're
  :    : here!
 @>Text: No doubt you've heard that I'm capable of discerning your
  :    : Pokémon's hidden potential.
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: I take it you've come to have your Pokémon's 
 :    : Hidden Power identified?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: PokeSelect
 @>Text: Bring out the Pokémon whose Hidden Power I
  :    : should decypher!
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: What, are you afraid of this knowledge? Knowledge
   :    : is power, after all!
  @>Text: If you desire my services at any point, I shall be here
   :    : waiting!
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).egg?
   @>Text: ... I may be able to tell a Pokémon's Hidden Power,
    :    : but I'm not a psychic, you know. I can't do anything
    :    : with an egg!
   @>Jump to Label: PokeSelect
   @>
  : Else
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : potential=pbHiddenPower(pkmn)
  @>Script: pbMessage(_INTL(
  :       : "{1}'s Hidden Power is {2}.", 
  :       : pkmn.name,
  :       : PBTypes.getName(potential[0])))
  @>Text: Would you like me to check another Pokémon?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Jump to Label: PokeSelect
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>Text: If you desire my services at any point, I shall be here
    :    : waiting!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: If you desire my services at any point, I shall be here
  :    : waiting!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Show Animation: Player, [Exclaim bubble]
@>Set Move Route: Player
 :              : $>Turn Left
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Set Event Location: [Aide],(028,020)
@>Wait: 1 frame(s)
@>Set Move Route: [Aide]
 :              : $>SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
 :              : $>Change Opacity: 255
 :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Right
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Move Right
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Text: I'm one of Professor Hawthorn's Aides, I've got 
 :    : something here for you from the Professor.
@>Text: He says he forgot to give it to you before you left. It's 
 :    : a good thing I managed to catch up to you before you 
 :    : went to Yozora Island!
@>Text: Anyway, here you go.
@>Script: pbReceiveItem(:EXPALL)
@>Text: This item is the EXP Share. If you turn it on, all Pokémon
 :    : will receive experience, even if they didn't participate
 :    : in battle!
@>Text: I'll be off now, the Professor sends his regards and 
 :    : wishes you luck on the rest of your journey!
@>Set Move Route: [Aide]
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Move Left
 :              : $>Change Opacity: 0
 :              : $>SE: 'Door exit', 80, 100
@>Wait for Move's Completion

@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(10,"A",true)
@>Set Event Location: [Aide],(026,020)
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(8,"A",true)
@>Control Self Switch: A =ON
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Gym Terminal
(X,Y): (012,028)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: gymtelecom

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Right
 @>Text: Accessing Gym Network.
 @>Label: Start
 @>Text: Please select what you want to know about.
 @>Show Choices: Gym Pokemon Preference, Gym Puzzle, Gym Leader Information, Nothing
 (When Cancel: Choice 4)
 : When [Gym Pokemon Preference]
  @>Text: The Yozora Island Gym does not have a type preference.
   :    : The leader, Matthew, prefers to use Pokémon that are
   :    : associated with the night, or are otherwise nocturnal.
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : When [Gym Puzzle]
  @>Text: In order to progress through the gym, challengers will
   :    : need to switch between simulated phases of the day
   :    : to unveil new paths throughout the gym.
  @>Text: Each challenger will be given a remote control that
   :    : can swap between a simulated day and night at
   :    : certain junctions.
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : When [Gym Leader Information]
  @>Text: The Gym Leader, Matthew, is the owner of the Yozora
   :    : Island Observatory, a facility that works in tandem with
   :    : Research Station Cretya on Fulgum Island.
  @>Text: Both of these facilities work to explore the cosmos
   :    : beyond the planet's boundaries, as well as trying
   :    : to discover the mysteries of the universe.
  @>Text: Matthew, as well as the head of Research Station Cretya,
   :    : were responsible for the founding of the Sologlass Deep 
   :    : Space Telescope, which allowed both facilities to observe
   :    : far into the reaches of space.
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : When [Nothing]
  @>Text: Shutting down information database.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Else
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Conditions

Event Name: EV002
(X,Y): (025,012)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Yozora Gym's primary mechanic is shifting between Day and Night to traverse different paths. At certain points there will be an intersection where you're expected 
 :       : to shift from Day to Night, and vice versa. Certain paths will be uncrossable during certain phases of the simulated day. The paths will snake around pillars placed 
 :       : throughout the gym, eventually leading to the Gym Leader. There will be dead ends, and paths that are made to look like they go to the Gym Leader, but don't. 
 :       : When the player beats the Gym Leader, a teleporter beside the Gym Leader and at the entrance will activate, allowing you to quickly return to the entrance/exit.
@>

Event ID: 010
Event Name: Matthew
(X,Y): (010,003)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar074

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Matthew",
:       : "Haha, welcome challenger, to Yozora Gym! I see not even the ever changing Night and Day could stop you!")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Matthew",
:       : "My name is Matthew, and I am the Gym leader of Yozora Island. I specialize in
:       : Pokémon that are active at night.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Matthew",
:       : "Tell me, trainer, do you understand what makes the night magical? I'm sure you'd agree that it is wonderful.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Matthew",
:       : "The stars shine brightest at night, giving the world their light from far away, and 
:       : the sky takes on a beautiful shade of dark blue that can only be experienced during the late hours.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Matthew",
:       : "It's also the best time to look into space and try to find out what lies beyond our 
:       : planet! To uncover the secrets that the universe has hidden from us. This was why I became an astronomer.")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Matthew",
:       : "Lots of people fear the night, and what lies in it. Sure, the darkness it provides 
:       : cloaks the unknown, but that doesn't mean you should fear the night!")
@>Script: pbMessageWithName("Matthew",
:       : "You understand this, right? Then show me you have the courage to face the night, and all that lurks within it!")
@>Control Switches: [0122] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0113: Vs. Transition - Badge] = 2
@>Control Variables: [0114: Vs. Transition - Leader] = 3

Page #1
Conditions

Graphic: NPC 16

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",true)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",false)
@>

@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0104: Transition Handler] == OFF
 @>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]
  @>Call Common Event: -----------
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Relay Use
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<5
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Wonderful! Allow me to show you downstairs, then.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[048: Pharos Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: pbSetPokemonCenter
@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",true)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",false)
@>

 @>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]
  @>Call Common Event: -----------
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Relay Use
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<5
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Wonderful! Allow me to show you downstairs, then.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[048: Pharos Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]

 @>
: Branch End

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Player Touch

List of Event Commands:

                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>SE: 'Automatic Door', 100, 100
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Up
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Set Move Route: Player
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Up
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Wait for Move's Completion
@>Change Transparent Flag: Transparency
@>Set Move Route: This event
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Down
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

@>Wait: 8 frame(s)
@>Change Transparent Flag: Normal
@>Transfer Player:[132: Kaiyomi Pokemon Center], (013,017), Up, No Fade
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
@>

Event ID: 001
Event Name: Lazarus
(X,Y): (025,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trainer_SCIENTIST

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \xn[Lazarus]Challenger, welcome to the first stop on your 
 :    : journey throughout the Yitria Gym Circuit.
@>Text: \xn[Lazarus]I am Lazarus, Leader of Veiskille City's Gym, an 
 :    : android that is optimized for battling.
@>Text: \xn[Lazarus]Long ago, I was built to bring harm to both Humans
 :    : and Pokémon alike. However, I have come far from those days.
@>Text: \xn[Lazarus]To atone for my previous transgressions, I have
 :    : sought to lend aid to those around me. As a result, I have 
 :    : surpassed my original programming.
@>Text: \xn[Lazarus]If you have any wish to challenge the Yitria 
 :    : League, you'll have to overcome me first.
@>Text: \xn[Lazarus]Battle control has been established, prepare for 
 :    : evaluation, now!
@>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = ON
@>Control Variables: [0103: Vs. Transition ID] = 1
@>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 2
@>Control Variables: [0113: Vs. Transition - Badge] = 0
@>Control Variables: [0114: Vs. Transition - Leader] = 0
@>Comment: EndSpeech: Concluding evaluation. Results: exemplary. Battle control terminated.
@>Conditional Branch: Script: TrainerBattle.start(:ANDROID, "Lazarus")
 @>Text: \xn[Lazarus]Congratulations on your victory. You have passed 
  :    : the first trial on your road to qualifying for the Yitria League.
 @>Text: \xn[Lazarus]As per the rules for beating a Gym Leader, I 
  :    : hereby award you with the badge I oversee; the Processor 
  :    : Badge.
 @>Text: \me[Badge get]\pn earned the Processor Badge!\wtnp[90]
 @>Script: $player.badges[0]=true # Processor Badge
 @>Control Variables: [0120: Total Badge Count] += 1
 @>Text: \xn[Lazarus]As another token for beating me, you are to 
  :    : have this Technical Machine.
 @>Script: pbReceiveItem(:TM10)
 @>Text: \xn[Lazarus]That Technical Machine contains the move Hidden 
  :    : Power. As the name suggests, its power varies depending on 
  :    : the Pokémon that uses it.
 @>Wait: 10 frame(s)
 @>Text: \xn[Lazarus]Your next Gym challenge awaits on Yozora 
  :    : Island, just east of Veiskille City.
 @>Text: \xn[Lazarus]To get there, you will have to traverse the 
  :    : undersea caverns of Seashift Tunnel.
 @>Text: \xn[Lazarus]I wish you good fortune on the rest of your 
  :    : challenge.
 @>Control Variables: [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] = 1
 @>Script: advanceQuestToStage(:Quest4, 2)
 :       : overwriteQuestDesc(:Quest4)
 @>Control Switches: [0004: Defeated Gym 1] = ON
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>Control Variables: [0107: Plot Control Variable] = 7
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbTrainerEnd
@>

(X,Y): (015,002)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Script: numfloors=3
@>Script: cur=numfloors-pbGet(10)
:       : pbSet(11,pbMessage(
:       :     _I("Which floor do you want?"),
:       :     [_I("3F"),_I("2F"),_I("1F"),
:       :     _I("Exit")],
:       :     numfloors+1,nil,cur))
@>Script: t=pbGet(11)
:       : pbSet(11,numfloors-t)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] == 0
 @>Comment: Choice was cancelled.
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: Start
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] > Variable [0010: Elevator current floor]
  @>Comment: Go up.
  @>Screen Shake: 4, 9, @12
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall left]
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Control Variables: [0010: Elevator current floor] += 1
  @>Jump to Label: Start
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] < Variable [0010: Elevator current floor]
  @>Comment: Go down.
  @>Screen Shake: 4, 9, @12

   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Hello, hello!\nI am the official Name Rater!
@>Text: Want me to rate the nicknames of your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: Which Pokémon's nickname should I critique?
 @>Comment: Opens a screen for choosing a Pokémon.  The index 
  :       : is stored in variable 1, the name in variable 3.
 @>Script: pbChoosePokemon(1,3)
 @>Comment: If variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has 
  :       : canceled choosing a Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0001: Temp Pokemon Choice] < 0
  @>Text: I see.Do come visit again.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for eggs.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isEgg?
  @>Text: Now, now... That is merely an Egg!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Comment: Check for Shadow Pokémon.
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: (pbGetPokemon(1).isShadow? rescue false)
  @>Text: I wouldn't dare critique a Shadow Pokémon's name!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGetPokemon(1).isForeign?($player)
  @>Text: Hmmm... \v[3] it is!
  @>Text: This is a magnificent nickname! It is impeccably 
   :    : beyond reproach!
  @>Text: You'll do well to cherish your \v[3] now and 
   :    : beyond.
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Text: \v[3], is it?\nThat is a decent nickname!
 @>Text: But, would you like me to give it a nicer name?
 @>Text: How about it?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: Ah, good. Then, what shall the new nickname be?
  @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
  :       : species=PBSpecies.getName(pkmn.species)
  :       : pbTextEntry("#{species}'s nickname?",0,10,5)
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbGet(5)=="" || pbGet(5)==pbGet(3)
   @>Comment: Resets the Pokémon's nickname to the species name.
   @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : pkmn.name=PBSpecies.getName(
   :       :                         pkmn.species)
   :       : pbSet(3,pkmn.name)
   @>Text: Done! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
    :    : as \v[3]!
   @>Text: It looks no different from before, and yet, this is 
    :    : vastly superior!
   @>Text: How fortunate for you!
   @>
  : Else
   @>Comment: Retrieves the Pokémon indexed at variable 1 and 
    :       : changes its name to variable 5.
   @>Script: pkmn=pbGetPokemon(1)
   :       : pkmn.name=pbGet(5)
   @>Text: Done! From now on, this Pokémon shall be known
    :    : as \v[5]!
   @>Text: It is a better name than before!\nHow fortunate for 
    :    : you!
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: I see. Do come visit again.
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: I see. Do come visit again.
 @>
: Branch End
@>

@>Text: \rHello, and welcome to the Pokémon Center.
@>Text: \rWe restore your tired Pokémon to full health.
@>Text: \rWould you like to rest your Pokémon?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rOK, I'll take your Pokémon for a few seconds.
 @>Recover All: Entire Party
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Turn Left
  :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",true)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Script: count=$player.pokemonCount
 :       : for i in 1..count
 :       :   pbSet(6,i)
 :       :   pbSEPlay("Battle ball shake")
 :       :   pbWait(16)
 :       : end
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation ON
 @>Play ME: 'Pkmn healing', 100, 100
 @>Wait: 58 frame(s)
 @>Control Variables: [0006: Poké Center healing ball count] = 0
 @>Set Move Route: [Healing balls (L)]
  :              : $>Stop Animation OFF
 @>Set Move Route: This event
  :              : $>Wait: 15 frame(s)
  :              : $>Turn Down
 @>Wait for Move's Completion
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: pbPokerus?
  @>Text: \rYour Pokémon may be infected by PokeRus.
  @>Text: \rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they 
   :    : are microscopic life-forms that attach to Pokémon.
  @>Text: \rWhile infected, Pokémon are said to grow 
   :    : exceptionally well.
  @>Control Switches: [0002: Seen Pokérus in Poké Center] = ON
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: \rThank you for waiting.
  @>Text: \rWe've restored your Pokémon to full health.
  @>Set Move Route: This event
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 1
   :              : $>Wait: 10 frame(s)
   :              : $>Graphic: "NPC 16', 0, 2, 0
  @>Wait for Move's Completion
  @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rWe hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>Script: pbSetSelfSwitch(3,"A",false)
@>

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 010
Event Name: Relay Receptionist
(X,Y): (012,004)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: NPC 22

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This leads to the Regional Teleporter Relay.
@>Conditional Branch: Switch [0104: Transition Handler] == OFF
 @>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = ON
 @>Text: If you are unaware of its services, I can explain them 
  :    : to you.
 @>Show Choices: Explain, Use the Relay
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Explain]
  @>Text: The Regional Teleporter Relay was created over 500 
   :    : years ago by the inventor of the PC System, Bill.
  @>Text: He believed that long-distance travel should be much 
   :    : easier than having to charter a plane or boat.
  @>Text: Over time, the Relay has become a staple in Pokemon 
   :    : Centers across the world.
  @>Text: The Relay allows people to travel wherever they 
   :    : want within the world at no cost at all!
  @>Text: However, this works differently for trainers taking 
   :    : the Gym Challenge.
  @>Text: Trainers that are udnertaking the Gym Challenge will 
   :    : have access to the Relay restricted twofold.
  @>Text: First, in order to use the Relay, you will need to have 
   :    : a minimum of five badges.
  @>Text: Secondly, the Relay will only take them to locations 
   :    : they've visited the Pokemon Center of already.
  @>Text: This is to prevent Gym Challengers from skipping 
   :    : across the Region at their leisure to circumvent the 
   :    : challenge.
  @>Text: These were enacted to maintain the tradition of the 
   :    : Gym Challenge.
  @>Text: From the looks of it, you appear to be taking the 
   :    : challenge yourself.
  @>Text: We hope that once you are far enough with your 
   :    : challenge, you will use the Relay to your heart's 
   :    : content!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : When [Use the Relay]
  @>Jump to Label: Relay Use
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Text: Would you care to use our services today?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Label: Relay Use
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $player.numbadges<5
  @>Text: It would appear you don't have enough badges to 
   :    : use the Teleporter Relay.
  @>Text: We hope that when you have enough badges, you 
   :    : will consider using our services in the future!
  @>Exit Event Processing
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: Wonderful! Allow me to show you downstairs, then.
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
  @>Wait: 8 frame(s)
  @>Transfer Player:[048: Pharos Pokemon Center], (050,004), Down
  @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: We hope to see you again!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @6
 @>Text: We thank you for using the Teleporter Relay Service, 
  :    : hopefully everything was to your satisfaction!
 @>Text: Please, come again any time!
 @>
: When [No]

 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Up
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Through ON
 :              : $>Move Down
@>Wait for Move's Completion

@>Set Move Route: Player
                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Move Down
 :              : $>Through OFF
@>Wait for Move's Completion

                  (Ignore If Can't Move)
 :              : $>Turn Right
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Turn Left
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

Autonomous Movement

Options Enabled
Move Animation

 @>Text: Would you like to use the Teleporter?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]

  @>Set Move Route: Player
   :              : $>Move Right
   :              : $>Turn Up
  @>Wait for Move's Completion

                    (Ignore If Can't Move)
   :              : $>SE: 'Automatic Door', 100, 100
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Right
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Up
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

                    (Ignore If Can't Move)
   :              : $>Through ON
   :              : $>Move Up

   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
   :              : $>Turn Down
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

 : When [No]

 @>
: Else

Conditions

Autonomous Movement

Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

@>Script: cur=numfloors-pbGet(10)
:       : pbSet(11,pbMessage(
:       :     _I("Which floor do you want?"),
:       :     [_I("Upper Level"),_I("Lower Level"),_I("Exit")],
:       :     numfloors+1,nil,cur))
@>Script: t=pbGet(11)
:       : pbSet(11,numfloors-t)
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] == 0
 @>Comment: Choice was cancelled.
 @>
: Else
 @>Label: Start
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0011: Elevator new floor] > Variable [0010: Elevator current floor]
  @>Comment: Go up.
  @>Screen Shake: 4, 9, @12
  @>Set Move Route: [Wall left]
   :              : $>Turn Left
   :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)

 : Branch End

#------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Event ID: 001
Event Name: Quest Master
(X,Y): (013,007)

Page #1
Conditions
None

Graphic: trchar039

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Hi there, \PN! Do you want to take on a quest?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: That's the spirit! Your quest is to find a \bSuper Rod\r!
 @>Text: If you ever want to check your quests, talk to the 
  :    : sign next to me or check your \bPokéGear\r.
 @>Script: pbAddQuest(0)
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: Ah, well, that's a shame! You can get great rewards!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #2
Conditions
Self Switch A is ON

Graphic: trchar039

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Script: pbCompletedQuest?(0)
 @>Text: A-ma-zing! You actually found a Super Rod! I'm so 
  :    : moved! Let me give you something as a reward!
 @>Script: pbReceiveItem(:POTION,999)
 @>Control Self Switch: B =ON
 @>
: Else
 @>Text: What? Do you want to give up?
 @>Show Choices: Yes, No
 (When Cancel: Choice 2)
 : When [Yes]
  @>Text: That's a shame! I guess you've got other things to do!
  @>Script: pbDeleteQuest(0)
  @>Control Self Switch: A =OFF
  @>
 : When [No]
  @>Text: Get working, then! One Super Rod, no more, no less!
  @>Text: Change quest's name?
  @>Show Choices: Yes, No
  (When Cancel: Choice 2)
  : When [Yes]
   @>Script: pbSetQuestName(0,
   :       : "A new story begins!")
   @>
  : When [No]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

Page #3
Conditions
Self Switch B is ON

Graphic: trchar039

Autonomous Movement
Type: Fixed
Speed: 3: Slow
Freq: 3: Low
Options Enabled
Move Animation
Trigger: Action Button

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: Thanks a lot for helping me! I'm forever grateful!
@>Text: /bA quest shouldn't be given twice. Look through the 
 :    : events on this map to see how to use the methods 
 :    : from the script.
@>Text: /bYou can also change properties of a quest during 
 :    : runtime by going "pbSetQuestColor(id, color)" or 
 :    : "pbSetQuestName(id, name)".
@>Text: /bLook through the first lines of the script to see 
 :    : what methods are available
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 001
Common Event Name: Dependent event ref

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: \rDo you want me to stop following you?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Text: \rI'll just vanish, then.
 @>Script: Followers.remove("May")
 @>Script: pbDeregisterPartner
 @>
: When [No]
 @>Text: \rLet's keep going!
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 002
Common Event Name: -----------

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 003
Common Event Name: Pandora's PC

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Conditional Branch: Variable [0110: Player Avatar] == 9
 @>Text: Which function would you like to access?\ch[1,-1,Egg Incubator, Wonder Trade Uplink, Form Change Protocol,
  :    : Pandora's ATM, Log Off]
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0110: Player Avatar] == 8
  @>Text: Which function would you like to access?
  @>Show Choices: Egg Incubator, Wonder Trade Uplink, Form Change Protocol, Log Off
  (When Cancel: Choice 4)
  : When [Egg Incubator]
   @>Comment: --- Egg Incubator
   @>Text: This will run the Egg Incubator protocol, which will
    :    : automatically hatch all eggs in your party.
   @>Text: Would you like to hatch all your eggs?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: Please insert all Eggs in your party into the
     :    : machine for immediate incubation.
    @>Script: pbHatchAll
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Wonder Trade Uplink]
   @>Comment: --- Wonder Trade
   @>Text: Accessing the Worldwide Uplink Array.
   @>Text: Please be advised, our servers were recently 
    :    : hacked, and we are not back to optimal standards.
   @>Text: As a result, an influx of illegally leveled Pokémon are
    :    : making their way through the servers.
   @>Text: Is this acceptable?
   @>Show Choices: Yes, No
   (When Cancel: Choice 2)
   : When [Yes]
    @>Text: Initalizing trade system, please stand by\..\..\..
     :    : \wtnp[20]\se[PC open]
    @>Script: pbWonderTrade(1,[:MISSINGNO,:HIBAKTOL],[:MISSINGNO,:HIBAKTOL])
    @>
   : When [No]
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : When [Form Change Protocol]
   @>Comment: --- Form Change
   @>
  : When [Log Off]
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Variable [0110: Player Avatar] < 8
   @>Text: Currently, there are no functions available. Please check
    :    : back later.
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>Play SE: 'PC close', 100, 100
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 004
Common Event Name: Explain Relay

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: The Regional Teleporter Relay was created over 50 
 :    : years ago by the inventor of the PC System, Bill.
@>Text: He believed that long-distance travel should be much 
 :    : easier than having to charter a plane or boat.
@>Text: Over time, the Relay has become a staple in Pokemon 
 :    : Centers across the world.
@>Text: The Relay allows people to travel wherever 
 :    : they want within the world at no cost at all!
@>Text: However, this works differently for trainers taking 
 :    : the Gym Challenge.
@>Text: Trainers that are undertaking the Gym Challenge will 
 :    : have access to the Relay restricted twofold.
@>Text: First, in order to use the Relay, you will need to have 
 :    : a minimum of four badges.
@>Text: Secondly, the Relay will only take them to locations 
 :    : they've visited the Pokemon Center of already.
@>Text: This is to prevent Gym Challengers from skipping 
 :    : across the Region at their leisure to circumvent the 
 :    : challenge.
@>Text: These were enacted to maintain the tradition of the 
 :    : Gym Challenge.
@>Text: From the looks of it, you appear to be taking the 
 :    : challenge yourself.
@>Text: We hope that once you are far enough with your 
 :    : challenge, you will use the Relay to your heart's 
 :    : content!
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 006
Common Event Name: Vs. Alyssia

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: --- Pre-Battle Intro Setup
@>Call Common Event: Vs. Transition - Flash
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 6 frame(s)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(2,"Transitions/Bars_Under.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=230,blendType=0)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(5,"Transitions/Bars_Over.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=230,blendType=0)
@>Move Picture: 5, @5, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 230, Normal
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(1,"Transitions/BGs/BGAlyssia2.png",1,0,0)
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 1, (-255,-255,-255,0), @0
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 1, (0,0,0,0), @5
@>Move Picture: 1, @180, Upper Left (-4096,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Play SE: 'Vs flash', 80, 100
@>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
@>Script: pbShowPicture(3,"Transitions/PTs/Char_AlyssiaS.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Wait: 25 frame(s)
@>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
@>Play SE: 'Vs sword', 80, 100
@>Script: pbShowPicture(4,"Transitions/PTs/Char_Alyssia.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(6,"Transitions/Names/Name_Alyssia.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Move Picture: 3, @30, Center (250,192), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Call Common Event: Vs. Transition - Balls
@>Wait: 60 frame(s)
@>Move Picture: 1, @90, Upper Left (-4096,0), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 1, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Move Picture: 2, @5, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 3, @5, Center (250,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 4, @5, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 5, @5, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Move Picture: 6, @5, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 0, Normal
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 10, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 11, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 12, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 13, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 14, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 15, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 16, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Wait: 6 frame(s)
@>Erase Picture: 1
@>Erase Picture: 2
@>Erase Picture: 3
@>Erase Picture: 4
@>Erase Picture: 5
@>Erase Picture: 6
@>Erase Picture: 10
@>Erase Picture: 11
@>Erase Picture: 12
@>Erase Picture: 13
@>Erase Picture: 14
@>Erase Picture: 15
@>Erase Picture: 16
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @10
@>Comment: --- Pre-Battle Intro Conclusion
@>Control Switches: [0104: Transition Handler] = OFF
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 009
Common Event Name: Vs. Gym Leader

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: --- Pre-Battle Intro Setup
@>Call Common Event: Vs. Transition - Flash
@>Script: pbSet(1,["Processor","Crescent","Nova","Scorch",
:       :          "Strength","Spectral","Genesis","Shell"][pbGet(113)])
@>Script: pbSet(2,["Lazarus","Matthew","Joshua","Lindsey",
:       :          "Serafina","Fullers","Lifrana","Carrie"][pbGet(114)])
@>Change Screen Color Tone: (-255,-255,-255,0), @6
@>Wait: 6 frame(s)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(1,"Transitions/BGs/BGLeader.png",0,0,0,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 1, (-255,-255,-255,0), @0
@>Script: pbShowPicture(2,"Transitions/Bars_Under.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=230,blendType=0)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(5,"Transitions/Bars_Over.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=230,blendType=0)
@>Move Picture: 5, @5, Center (256,192), (100%,100%), 230, Normal
@>Wait: 5 frame(s)
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 1, (0,0,0,0), @5
@>Move Picture: 1, @180, Upper Left (-4096,0), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Wait: 15 frame(s)
@>Play SE: 'Vs flash', 80, 100
@>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
@>Script: pbShowPicture(3,"Transitions/PTs/Char_#{pbGet(2)}S.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Wait: 25 frame(s)
@>Screen Flash: (255,255,255,255), @10
@>Play SE: 'Vs sword', 80, 100
@>Script: pbShowPicture(4,"Transitions/PTs/Char_#{pbGet(2)}.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(6,"Transitions/Names/Name_#{pbGet(2)}.png",1,256,192,zoomX=100,zoomY=100,opacity=255,blendType=0)
@>Script: pbShowPicture(7,"Transitions/Badges/Badge_#{pbGet(1)}.png",1,256,192)
@>Move Picture: 3, @30, Center (250,192), (100%,100%), 255, Normal
@>Call Common Event: Vs. Transition - Balls
@>Wait: 60 frame(s)
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 1, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 2, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5
@>Change Picture Color Tone: 3, (-255,-255,-255,0), @5

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 087
Common Event Name: Vs. Transition - Badge to Ball Check

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Checks for how many badges the player has.
 :       : Used for determining the ball count for Gym Leaders.
@>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count >= 9
 @>Comment: 10+ Badges
 @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 6
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count >= 6
  @>Comment: 7 Badges
  @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 5
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count >= 4
   @>Comment: 5 Badges
   @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 4
   @>
  : Else
   @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count >= 1
    @>Comment: 1 Badge
    @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 3
    @>
   : Else
    @>Conditional Branch: Script: $Trainer.badge_count == 0
     @>Comment: 0 Badges
     @>Control Variables: [0104: Vs. Transition - Pkmn] = 2
     @>
    : Else
     @>
    : Branch End
    @>
   : Branch End
   @>
  : Branch End
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>
: Branch End
@>

#==============================================================================
Common Event ID: 088
Common Event Name: Vs. Transition - BG

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Comment: Used for everything that isn't a Gym Leader or Elite Four. 
 :       : So, for trainers that move around.
 :       : So, basically, rival fights.
@>Comment: 0 = Basement, 1 = Black, 2 = Cave, 3 = City,
 :       : 4 = Elite, 5 = Shrine, 6 = Spectral
 :       : 
 :       : More to come
@>Script: pbSet(3,["Basement","Black","Cave","City",
:       :                "Elite","Shrine","Spectral"][pbGet(115)])
:       :                
@>

 @>Change Screen Color Tone: (0,0,0,0), @4

: Else

 :              : $>SE: 'Apricorn Tree - Shake', 100, 100
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 2
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 3

 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 1
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_2', 0, 2, 2

 :              : $>Script:

 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 4, 2
 :              : $>Wait: 2 frame(s)
 :              : $>Graphic: "Apricorn_0', 0, 4, 3

@>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Down
 @>Show Animation: This event, [Yellow Apricorn (Back)]
 @>
: Else
 @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Left
  @>Show Animation: This event, [Yellow Apricorn (Right)]
  @>
 : Else
  @>Conditional Branch: Player is facing Right
   @>Show Animation: This event, [Yellow Apricorn (Left)]
   @>
  : Else

    @>Show Animation: This event, [Yellow Apricorn (Front)]

Common Event ID: 104
Common Event Name: Mining Minigame

Trigger: None

List of Event Commands:
@>Text: This wall looks like it can be dug into. Dig into it?
@>Show Choices: Yes, No
(When Cancel: Choice 2)
: When [Yes]
 @>Conditional Branch: Script: rand(100) > 35
  @>Script: pbMiningGame
  @>
 : Else
  @>Text: You dig around in the wall for a bit, but find nothing...
  @>
 : Branch End
 @>Control Self Switch: A =ON
 @>Control Variables: [0112] += 1
 @>
: When [No]
 @>
: Branch End
@>
